longBusinessSummary: BPL Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells consumer electronic products primarily in India. It operates through Printed Circuit Board and Consumer Electronics segments. The company offers television, lighting, refrigerator, air-conditioner, fan, and kitchen appliances; single, double, and multi-layer printed circuit boards; and medical technologies. It sells its products under the BPL brand. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Bengaluru, India.
